long_description: Our warmest thermal top for boys, the plush and thick REI Expedition-Weight Quarter-Zip top makes an excellent next-to-skin layer for winter adventures in extreme cold. Non-pilling polyester fleece draws moisture away from the skin and dries quickly. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Mock neck; chin guard; flat seams.
short_description: Our warmest thermal top for boys, the plush and thick REI Expedition-Weight Quarter-Zip top makes an excellent next-to-skin layer for winter adventures in extreme cold.
